desc: ダメージを受けた時、確率でＢＢゲージが少し増加する

dictionary.lore: There once was a king who never lost his temper, because he thought by doing so his precious emotional strength would be expelled along with it. However, instead of his anger floating around inside himself, it flowed into his crown. Despite this, the people praised the king who never got angry, ignorant of the rage that filled his crown.

name: 聖冠マグナス・ゼブル
